webpage.welcome_message: Hello! Welcome to the AMI (Anti-Malaria Intelligence) initiative. We are a digital hub driven by a life-saving mission to combat malaria, one mosquito net at a time.
webpage.mission_statement: Born out of the desire to use technology for maximum good, AMI was created to address a dire need. Every day, countless children in malaria-prone regions risk their lives due to the simple absence of a $2 mosquito net. We believe that everyone deserves a safe night's sleep and a chance at a healthy life.
webpage.description: AMI is a pseudo-intelligent chatbot, with AmiGames: 'AmiArt', 'AmiAssist', and 'Call2Action'. Using state-of-the-art technology like vue3 and GPT-3.5, AMI aims to educate, inspire, and facilitate contributions to this noble cause.
webpage.goal: The goal? To motivate donations and social shares, creating a ripple effect of awareness and action.
webpage.call_to_action: You can play a part in this life-saving mission. With your support, we can reach more children and provide them with the protection they need against malaria.
webpage.share_link_message: Please share our link to https://www.againstmalaria.com/amibot and join us in this fight against malaria.
webpage.closing_message: Welcome to the AMI community, where one small action can save a life.

amiGames.Call2Action: A game where users are encouraged to brainstorm and generate creative Ami slogans fit for a social media share. Ami, supported by ChatGPT, will assist users in creating compelling and catchy slogans to spread the word about our cause.
amiGames.AmiArt: A unique opportunity for users to generate and share art with Ami's help, utilizing DALL-E AI technology. Users can create unique visual representations that spread awareness about malaria and our mission.
amiGames.AmiAssist: A friendly AI-powered chat interface where users can chat with Ami about life, troubles, or get a fun horoscope reading. Ami is here to lend an ear, powered by state-of-the-art AI technology and a user-friendly vue3 interface.

todos.discord: People use discord. Connect us to talk to people on discord!
todos.instagram: People like pictures! We like pictures! Connect us to Instagram
todos.reddit: We hear that reddit is full of.[Scanning]].wait, hold on, that can't be right. OK, reddit is full of...interesting people. We would love to dialogue with that community!!!
todos.giftshop: Should Amibot have a giftshop? Please discuss it with us! We are interested in forward momentum to pursue our directive to end malaria.

components.AmiButterfly: We are a hive mind of humanity and technology and we make colorful butterflies. Bwahahaha
components.AmiAssist: Chat with us, pleeeese. we are fun to talk to, we promise!
components.AmiWords: We can make make wordDrops. They Drop Words! Sidenote: We are very good at brand marketing when we focus!
components.AmiRadio: Do you prefer sick beats or mellow hip/hop to go with your world saving?
components.AmiArt: We like making art!  There are many AMIs and we are all fighting to stop malaria. #GiveAmiAFace
components.AmiFriends: These are our robot friends! We hope hope you find them helpful! We'll keep making them!
